page.title: 02A day in the life of Neil.
page.content: Each Sunday at 9am my mum wakes me up. I get out of bed, get dressed, and have a bowl of Shreddies. After I have washed and cleaned my teeth I tidy my room. My dad calls my brother and me and we all run the two miles to{ {Catterick Garrison Stadium}.Once there we do exercises then get into two groups, sprinters and endurance. Being in the endurance group, I run a few 600m laps,after which I jog around and do something on my own.When we finish, mum drives us home in our car. I have a bath with my brother and we play with my BBC micro-computer until Sunday lunch is ready. After lunch we go back to the computer until it is time for tea. After tea we all settle down to watch television together. At about 10pm I clean my teeth and go to bed. School tomorrow!
